values:
Bill and Dana broke up and now were not exactly going out but.... getting there! Toms getting out this weekend to come down to visit. Sponge and I are totally broken up... and Dylan likes me alot, again. WOW .

Any ways my knees doing really good, i can run but i look kinda dumb and i cant run fast, i can swim, i can ride a bike but its hard. Im so glad i didnt have to end up getting actual surgery. 

I am so afraid for this school year to start, i really do not want to go to MHS. Theres some people in MHS whom i cannot stand. Its not just that i judje them, they judge me and harrass me and i cant stand it. I have enough going on in my life right now... i dont need stupid bullshit high school drama overwhelming me. 

My birthday is August 7.... yay ill be fucking 15! one more year till i can drive. I am gunna try my best this year in school so that I can have good grades to show for BCTH. I want to atleast get into that school in my junior year. I also have to do good so that i can get good student discount on my car insurance. YES! They do have that. You also get a discount for Drivers ED... but i dont have to worry about that for another year. 

The people who I would talk to a lot at school and considered great friends... they are hanging out with the people i dislike and it hurts that they never ever have time to call me or i.m me. Krysta thanks for calling me i love you... u are like the only one who has outa "them". Well it sucks seriously.... i dont know what im gunna do when i go back to school and get harassed by the assholes again and my friends arent there to back me up. :( 

Well i must go0 adios.... comments pwease??

<3laura
http://crimson-tearzz.livejournal.com/4905.html

Going to a concerttonight with sponge and his dad to see drummer of Lynnyrd Skynnard. w00t w00t.

Tommy is coming down in like 2 weeks for a visit.

I talked to bill last night for like 2 or 3 hours and well he confused me.
How can you break my fucking heart and tell me i was too good for you? I know i wasnt too good for him he could have any girl he wants and why did he pick me? Blah make me fall in love with you, break up with me. Get my hopes up... lead me on and then crash all my hopes down again, stomp all over them and now tell me that i was too good for you!!! WTF. I want him back which is so dumb on my part. He sent me this one song "Make a move" by incubus and like its in my buddyprofile on (t33nagexdirtxbag) and also you could go to www.letssingit.com and look it up. Tell me what you think he wants of me? If he wants me to move on or make a move to get him back! I D K.

Well I went to Erin Mooneys sweet 16 it was cool met some cool techies and chilled with Rae. Hah i drank 3 smirnoff twisted green apples.... YUMMIES!!! Didnt get drunk though... HAHA i ganked them from the adults cooler thingy. Well any ways My sisters boy friend broke up with her so I have been taking care of her. She was with him for 1 year 8 months and then he fucking broke up with her. I WANT TO CHOP HIS BALLS OFF AND SHOVE THEM UP HIS NOSE AND CUT HIS FUCKIN DICK OFF AND SHOVE IT DOWN HIS THROAT!!!! Not only will his balls be blue but his face will be too....haha im evil. :) dont mess with my sister thats a word of advice.

<3laura
http://crimson-tearzz.livejournal.com/4678.html

I dont know what love is, but when i'm with you, i feel like the safest person in the world. I forget about everything else. Nothing else matters. It's about the here & now. & when you leave, its a waiting game..because all i want..is the next day i get to see you. & that's the reason i keep on going everyday. In hopes that today is the next day i get to spend even one minute with you. So if this isn't love, it should be, because it's the best thing in the world..

Falling in love is easy,
staying in love requires work.

 The first time you fall in love, it changes your life forever.
& no matter how hard you try, that feeling never goes away..  (billy)

To be with the person you love
for just one day makes the rest of
the days without them seem pathetic!

 he got her out of bed in the morning,
dragged her to school, pulled her through classes,
brightened up her day, & didnt and still doesnt even know he did it
Now what does she do when he's no longer there for her?    (BILLY)

Love sucks.... 3 boys ive fallen in love with... thats a lot for my age i know but i cant help it! No one seems to measure up to bill and it kills me. He kills me well. I havent been with Bill since fucking New years day of 2005. And every single day since ive been with out him has been hell. It doesnt hurt as much as it did but it still hurts and tonight Im feeling a lot of pain from him. He was my first love and I hate him so much! But despite all the imperfections i see him perfectly... i know there are imperfections but i look past them all. I hate how he never thinks of me, never calls or i/m's or texts me... doesnt talk to me when he see's me. Im just another face to him and it kills me so much. Its been what 200 days and look at how much pain im in still!

</3 laura
http://crimson-tearzz.livejournal.com/4550.html

ahhhh my lifes confusing. W0w we got outa school early today at 1 cuz of the heat. Some fuck head took my contact prints in photography so i had to spend another 1 n a half in the dark room and almost chopped my finger off! I had to make 5by 7's and cut the 8 by 10's and i was so pist that i almost cut my finger off! It was bleeding alot grrr. Yo0 i just found out that billy had sex in a shower with this other gay guy.... ahhhh even though hes an ass i still love him... i dont miss him, i miss who i thought he was. Who should i go out with guys?! I just dont know its all very confusing blah. I g2g now!!! Love ya'll.

<3laura
http://crimson-tearzz.livejournal.com/4173.html

Grrr my sisters freaking talking to Sponge. I want to keep sponge close to me but i dont want a boyfriend so i broke up with him. RAWR. every one wants me to go out with him, what about Tommy? I love 2 guys... this sucks grrrrr. My sister never talked to my boyfriends/ Ex's and now she is. Eryn really likes sponge i can tell. Every one does and I dont blame them, i mean i love him. I just dont know what the hell to do about this all i kinda wunna cry. I was almost crying yesterday because im so sick of this. Not only am i torn between two guys that i love, but Dylan (who likes me a lot) wants to get back with me and all this stuff and then theres a few other guys who like me. I dont see why Im not "hot" grrr boys confuse me. Any who im getting verrry tired i had a long ass day. I had to be in school at 7:15 and was with Young half of the freaking day! I got an 88 on my make up test for Young. Then i got a 77 on my US Cultures test which im proud of.... OMG I DIDNT FAIL! I like guessed almost the whole thing it was the essay that pulled it all back together. Summers almost here... whoo hoo. Im walking with out krutches now but i still have this fucking brace on and i cannot take it off which sucks. I wunna go swimming or some thing i wunna run around its summer!! WTF!

<3laura
http://crimson-tearzz.livejournal.com/3989.html

SpongeyFreak990: I want nothing more then to make you happy. and i will always do all i can to reach that endless hoal of mine. 
SpongeyFreak990: I want to be more then a boyfreind. i want to be your best frined to.
SpongeyFreak990: Someone you will never be afraid to talk to about anything.
SpongeyFreak990: im here to lend my ears, my words, and my heart

I love this boy. I do, I do :)

Hes genuine, i wont throw him away i swear.

<3laura

Sponge and Laura (May 31 2005)
http://crimson-tearzz.livejournal.com/3725.html

-;- Forget his name forget his walk forget the way he used to talk forget the love you once knew remember how theres someone new forget the fun you once shared forget the fact he once cared forget the time you spent together remember how hes gone forever forget the times they played your song forget you cried all night long forget how close you once were remember how he belongs to her forget you memorized his every part forget he held the key to your heart forget the things he used to say remember how hes gone away forget the times he used  to phone forget the nights you were alone forget the times you wore his ring remember how shes everything forget the thrills when he walked by forget the times he made you cry forget the way he said your name remember how things arent the same forget the times you looked into his eyes forget you died when he said goodbye forget hes the only one you loved remember how its not you hes thinking of forget the places you used to go forget how you loved him so forget the times his lips met yours remember how he doesnt love you anymore -;-
http://crimson-tearzz.livejournal.com/3470.html

Well lets see... my knee doesnt hurt any more really! I can lift it a little with out support from my hands or some one else. The doctor told me to try and do that and i couldnt but now i can... which is a good sign that my muscles are working. YAY! Well im getting around much easier and better on my krutches... im adapting to them i guess? I want to go out tonight on my krutches but im just afraid I will get knocked down. My friends said that they'd protect me. I dont know about tonight though cuz it might not stop raining and its kinda slippery and wet outside. Well, we'll see how it goes. I like a lot of guys right now and one in particular has caught my heart. But the truth is that Tom Sands still has half my heart... with out him I'd be incomplete. I want to be by his side wether were a couple or just friends. Well my cold is nearly as bad as it used to be which is go0d. Im just coughing a lot now and my nose is a little bit stuffed up. Ahh ill get over it. Im coming back to school MONDAY! Well Laura must get going now.... adios!

<3laura
http://crimson-tearzz.livejournal.com/3144.html

I feel like crying right now. I just broke up with my boy friend (Tom Sands). Its a very confusing matter but heres the over all summary. Im still here for him no matter what and Im not saying theres NO chance for us in the future, but I cant stay in a relationship thats at the time is non - existent, ya know? I still care and Love him but... I never get to see him which makes it hard to stay in a relationship. When he gets out we are going to talk things over in person and see how things go from there... other wise im single for now. I like a few guys one in particular.... im not very big on giving names out on the internet but if you want to know just ask me if you dont already know. I typed the whole letter up because Im a pretty fast typer and writing gives me writers cramp. If I had written the letter on paper by hand... it would probably be like 3 or 4 pages. It was pretty long and heart felt. Im not going to drop him like a fly because no matter what... our past together from the first time that we met to the last good byes will never be erased from my memory. Well any ways. I went to the ortho pedics yesterday and they told me that If in a month my leg doesnt heal at all that I well have to get SURGERY! Thats like my biggest fear.... SURGERY! Well i tore all my tendons, nerves, muscles and cartlidge around my knee and in my lower thigh a bit My knee hurts a bit of course it is going to be freaking sore! Well im out of school until Monday with doctors excuses so the school can bite my ass if they wunna complain about absentys  Well im going now adios!!!

<3laura
http://crimson-tearzz.livejournal.com/2940.html

Im in love... and not with Tom....
I found out some thing, and Well Tom and my relationship is really rocky right now and im not sure if when he gets out if we will still be a couple... Im not steady with him, ive been trying to0 play the field (not as a player) but to find out who i like a lot... and ill say it straight out.... ive fallen hard for some one! Well im all crippled right now and cant go to school. I was at Conwell Egans dance and some boys started a "little mosh pit" and ummm well i slid on the grass (it was outside for the srping luewow*how ever u spell it*) Well my knee cap popped outa place and was all the way to the side of my leg and it hurt. Well they called the ambulance and well.... they sent me to the Lower Bucks Hospital in Bristol. I was there for like what seemed like a million hours... they put me on morphine drip and all that crap. Well now im on Vication and Naproxen  wooohhhoooo i get to be schoolless for a while! Yay... so some great things happened from being crippled. Well i dont know what else to say so0 im gunna go now...adios...


<3laura
http://crimson-tearzz.livejournal.com/2668.html

In like 10 minutes Tom will be 18! wooo hooo i guess... hehe... well its kinda odd but i dont care!

Well school is school... lifes is life... how else should i explain it?? It could be worse so im not going to complain. Im bored and still have to do this one page journal thing for Mrs. Young but for some odd reason im not and watch me fall asleep before i do cuz im sleepy. I have a boyfriend... but I miss him and havent hung out with him since freaking last sunday! He's some where near redding in the group home kinda facility and its odd.... and its scary for me and him... and i worry about him and all that stuff that girlfriend does. See... the thing is some boys like me... and i like them back! I just dont know what to do. Im thinking about a break until hes out, like were still together... but not so0 steady, what do0 u people think if ur reading my everlasting entry? Well i must go and do home work instead of being a computer geek haha!

<3laura
http://crimson-tearzz.livejournal.com/2411.html

cant be long its late and im tired as all hell!
Well lets see... im still going out with Tom Sands and today was our one month anniversary. Court was set for may 5 but was postponed by our lawyer cuz he had another case that day. Custody court is coming...damn. We have like 34 days left of school....then it'll be summer of 2005! hell yes. i made it on the honor roll in the newspaper some how....odd? i got like 3 c's and a d ....wtf? o well i hid my report card from my parental unit (my fasha) n took it before he got it outa the mail haha....slick... well im out.... later

<3laura
http://crimson-tearzz.livejournal.com/2172.html

I am now going out with Tom Sands. Megan hates me for that but she needs to grow the hell up! Well any ways.... I havent talked to him since last Sunday and we hung out all day on Saturday. Every one wants me to cheat on him.... i hate cheaters and im strongly against doing some thing like that. Well.... im pissed off at one of my friends, Jena because shes being a little brat and wannabe and all this other crap! Well ive actually been going out with tom since April 2nd, I didnt know that we were going out for 2 weeks but he considered us going out so0! LOL.... im such a great girl friend lol..... well I really miss him. Custody Court was set for MAY 10 2005. But my lawyer had to reschedule it because he had another hearing that day. Im scared that I wont win the case and wont be able to move into my moms. I want to live with my mom but other things make me a bit hesitant... its too late now, soon my lifes gunna be changed a lot! And it scared me and im still scared, but thats life for you.... grab it by the horns as they say. Well im going to go now....adios!

<3laura

Tommy and Laura
April/2/2005
http://crimson-tearzz.livejournal.com/1909.html

i <3 xanga!
www.xanga.com/xxxsilent_tearzxxx

anywho.... im falling for this boy named tom.... he lives in Bristol. I really really really miss him... hes kinda in a residential unit in doylestown. He gets out on the weekends if he is good... i hope so much that he gets outa this weekend!I want to spend time with him. Last week we hung out at the neshaminy mall.... it was fun and one of the best days ive had in a long time. I was truly happy. It made me a little scared though, because he made me feel the way that bill kemler made me feel. Like nothing else matters when hes around and every things so happy. Well... i dont know what im doing tonight but he might be back home now(for the weekend) he sayed that he will be getting out for good in like 40 days or less. The thing is that hes 17 years old, 18 *May 10* thats kinda old for me.... o well age dosent matter unless he was like 25 then that would be just wrong.... well im gonig to six flags great adventure this saturday with my sister and her boy friend and maybe another person we dont know yet. Well i g2g cuz im not supposed to be on here right now.... im in school!

tOOdleZ!
<3laura

He doesnt care beccause hes just plainly an asshole.
Mike keeps asking me out and its annoying me cuz im just not attracted to0 him!!!!! I feel really bad, but i just cannot seem to go out with some one that i do not like! That would be wrong of me any whoz!! Well im going now cuz im off to0 do0 other stuff i guess... later
